plain_english_summary:
# Strategy: V 3.0 | ☢️ Beta Baller + TCCC 💊 | Deez, BrianE, HinnomTX, DereckN, Garen, DJKeyhole 🧙‍♂️ | AR: 9335.3%, DD 32.3% - BT date 1DEC19
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/CGNGBrEjjJlOLFTyaEAa/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Description**: Tactical Combat Casulty Care | If you take out the half and half last section from the v1.21 and go full YOLO with the SMH for the long term to keep the bot all semiconductor focused. Drawdown increased but massive gains increase as well. V2.1 tune up by HinnomTX (2201% to 4615% from 12/2019)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 39 assets:

• **Stocks**: BIL, IEF, SPY, UVXY, VIXY, SOXL, SHY, HIBL, SOXS, SQQQ, TECL, TQQQ, SPXL, UPRO, QLD, TLT, SPXU, EUO, YCS, CURE, TMV, TECS, ERX, EWZ, MVV, USD, DBC, UUP, TMF, UCO, GLD, SPXS, EPI, IYK, EFA, EEM, AGG, PUI, UGE

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ V 3.0 | ☢️ Beta Baller + TCCC 💊 | Deez, BrianE, HinnomTX, DereckN, Garen, DJKeyhole 🧙‍♂️ | AR: 9335.3%, DD 32.3% - BT date 1DEC19:
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If BIL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (7-day) is less than IEF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (7-day):
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - If :
              - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (6-day) is greater than 75.0:
                - Overbought S&P. Sell the rip. Buy volatility.:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - Select the bottom 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (13-day) from: UVXY, VIXY
              - Else branch:

                  - Buy SOXL (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:

                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - Select the bottom 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (7-day) from: SOXS, SQQQ

                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - Select the bottom 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (7-day) from: SOXL, TECL

                        - V1.2 | Five and Below | DJKeyhole | No Low Volume LETFs:
                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                            - Select the bottom 1 asset by returns (5-day) from: TECL, TQQQ, SPXL, SOXL, UPRO, QLD
                      - Else branch:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If UVXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 74.0:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - If :
                                  - If UVXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 84.0:
```
